message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe this product would be highly beneficial to you, and this offer reflects a fair price for its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $13,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $14,000 is already a competitive price.  I could meet you halfway at $13,500, which is still a significant saving compared to the value it offers you.
